name: appalachia
description: GeoJSON file of counties in Appalachia, as defined by the Appalachian Regional Commission

scripts.download_congressional_districts_114_geo: cdjson --state NY --state PA --state OH --state KY --state WV --state MD --state VA --state TN --state NC --state MS --state SC --state AL --state GA 500k 114 > build/cd_114.geojson
scripts.create_appalachia_geojson: ./bin/joinjson.js --leftprop features ./build/us_counties.geojson properties.GEOID ./build/arc_counties.json FIPS | ./bin/filterjson.js --prop features - "typeof val.properties.SUBREGION != 'undefined'" > appalachia.geojson
scripts.build:counties: run-s create_build_dir download_county_geojson download_county_data create_county_json create_appalachia_geojson create_appalachia_topojson
